des:
With the Ekinex skill for Alexa, you can manage building automation devices with your voice.

To get started, select "Enable Use" in the Alexa app to connect your account on the Ekinex cloud and discover your devices. For more information on connecting devices to Alexa, visit this page: http://tinyurl.com/alexa-smart-home.

To use the skill, you need activation names for your devices. There are two ways to define these names:
- Use the names previously set in the delégo app. They are shown to you in the Ekinex skill and you can edit them.
- Create an Alexa group, such as "Kitchen" or "Entrance", and add the devices. To find out more about creating Alexa groups, visit this page: http://tinyurl.com/alexa-smart-home-groups

Once you have identified the names of your devices, you can say for example:
"Alexa, turn on the light in the kitchen."
"Alexa, turn on the outside lights."
"Alexa, turn off the hall light."

Warning: for security reasons, Alexa cannot be used to control access devices, such as doors, gates and the like.
